content.p: What is incorrect about the work shown above? (Identify every incorrect step, not just the first.)
For each mistake, describe why the student made that mistake. What were they probably thinking? What was their reasoning?
What feedback would you give this student? Your feedback should not only give the correct steps to take, but also address their misconceptions.
